vulnerabilities.name: Windows RDP Remote Code Execution
vulnerabilities.description: Unpatched RDP service allows remote code execution without authentication
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Apply security patch KB5012345 immediately and restrict RDP access to VPN only

vulnerabilities.name: Weak SSL/TLS Configuration
vulnerabilities.description: Server accepts outdated encryption protocols TLS 1.0 and 1.1, vulnerable to downgrade attacks
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Update TLS configuration to 1.2 minimum, disable legacy protocols

vulnerabilities.name: SQL Server Authentication Bypass
vulnerabilities.description: SQL Server running with default credentials, allowing unauthorized database access
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Change default credentials immediately, implement strong password policy, enable SQL authentication logging

vulnerabilities.name: Outdated Web Application Framework
vulnerabilities.description: Web application running PHP 7.2 which has reached end of life with multiple known vulnerabilities
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Upgrade to PHP 8.1 or later, test application compatibility before deployment

vulnerabilities.name: Missing Security Headers
vulnerabilities.description: Web server missing critical security headers including X-Frame-Options and Content-Security-Policy
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Configure web server to include security headers, implement CSP policy

vulnerabilities.name: Unencrypted Network Traffic
vulnerabilities.description: Internal file share accessed over SMB v1 protocol without encryption
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Disable SMB v1, upgrade to SMB v3 with encryption enabled

vulnerabilities.name: Weak Password Policy
vulnerabilities.description: Active Directory configured with minimum 6-character passwords, no complexity requirements
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Implement 12-character minimum, require complexity, enable account lockout after 5 failed attempts

vulnerabilities.name: Unpatched Firewall Firmware
vulnerabilities.description: Network firewall running firmware version with known remote code execution vulnerability
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Update firewall firmware to latest version immediately, schedule regular firmware updates
